abstract: The British oil giant BP suffered another setback Thursday with its troubled Russian joint venture after a Moscow court disqualified the venture’s chief executive from holding corporate office in Russia for two years.
snippet: The British oil giant BP suffered another setback Thursday with its troubled Russian joint venture after a Moscow court disqualified the venture’s chief executive from holding corporate office in Russia for two years.
lead_paragraph: The British oil giant BP suffered another setback Thursday with its troubled Russian joint venture after a Moscow court disqualified the venture’s chief executive from holding corporate office in Russia for two years.

headline.main: Russian Court Bars Chief of Joint Venture, BP Says
